title: How to Make Sweet Party Mix

steps.headline: Microwave butter, corn syrup, and brown sugar for 2 minutes.
Pour cereal into brown paper bag.
Fold top of bag and shake well.
Add and mix in pretzels and peanuts.

text: Microwave butter, corn syrup, and brown sugar for 2 minutes. Stir after 1 minute. Add baking soda and vanilla.  Stir well.  Pour cereal into brown paper bag.  Pour butter mixture over cereal.  Microwave in paper bag 1-1/2 minutes.  Fold top of bag and shake well.  Add and mix in pretzels and peanuts.  Let cool then add M&M’s.  Enjoy!
